item.description: Bring your questions and perplexing Django issues to a Friday afternoon session at the new offices of CustomMade.  Thanks to CustomMade for hosting and sponsoring the meetup with food and beer! Some of you February newbies will likely have additional questions, and you more experienced Djangonauts, now's the time to kibitz and brainstorm.  A great way to greet spring with a leisurely Friday afternoon Django Meetup.  Note the starting time and come by when you can.
item.how_to_find_us: Held at the new CustomMade HQ: 105 First Avenue in Cambridge
item.name: Special Office Hours @ CustomMade
